name: R0CK3T _| |_| |\/| |>
description:
In R0CK3T _| |_| |\/| |>  you are given a explosions, enemies, a level editor, and a grenade launcher. Have fun.

Also, 5 dollar steam gift card to who ever makes the best level (chosen by me, check community thread) if there are more than 3 different people who enter. (Due to how steam works we need to be friends for at least a week, so it will take a while for you to get the digital giftcard)
